prompt: Where do I send my transcripts?
completion: Unofficial Transcripts Unofficial transcripts, and other admission documents required for the undergraduate application process can be uploaded via your ChooseTMU Applicant Portal. Unofficial transcripts can be used for the review and consideration of your application for admission.  If you are offered admission to a TMU program, it will be contingent upon the receipt and verification of your official documents.

prompt: How do I submit my transcripts?
completion: Official Transcripts In order for transcripts to be considered official, they must be in a sealed envelope and bear an original seal/stamp and/or official signature from an appropriate signatory.  Official transcripts can be submitted as indicated below: - Sent via the Ontario Universities' Application Centre (OUAC), if eligible. - Mailed/couriered to Toronto Metropolitan University, SeviceHub, 350 Victoria Street, Toronto, ON Canada M5B 2K3 - Delivered in person to the ServiceHub, located at 380 Victoria Street, Podium Building (POD) Room 150. Please visit the Document Submission webpage for more detailed information on transcript requirements and instructions on submitting your transcripts.

prompt: What type of transcripts do I need to submit?
completion: Unofficial transcripts, and other admission documents required for the undergraduate application process can be uploaded via your ChooseTMU Applicant Portal. Unofficial transcripts can be used for the review and consideration of your application for admission.  If you are offered admission to a TMU program, it will be contingent upon the receipt and verification of your official documents.

prompt: What is the deadline for submitting transcripts?
completion: The deadline for submitting transcripts is determined by the program to which you are applying. Please refer to the program page for more information on the specific deadline for your program.

prompt: Do I need to submit official transcripts?
completion: Yes, in order for transcripts to be considered official, they must be in a sealed envelope and bear an original seal/stamp and/or official signature from an appropriate signatory. Official transcripts can be submitted as indicated below: - Sent via the Ontario Universities' Application Centre (OUAC), if eligible. - Mailed/couriered to Toronto Metropolitan University, SeviceHub, 350 Victoria Street, Toronto, ON Canada M5B 2K3 - Delivered in person to the ServiceHub, located at 380 Victoria Street, Podium Building (POD) Room 150.

prompt: What is the best way to submit my transcripts?
completion: The best way to submit your transcripts is to send them via the Ontario Universities' Application Centre (OUAC), if eligible. Alternatively, you can mail/courier them to Toronto Metropolitan University, SeviceHub, 350 Victoria Street, Toronto, ON Canada M5B 2K3 or deliver them in person to the ServiceHub, located at 380 Victoria Street, Podium Building (POD) Room 150.

prompt: Where can I find more information on submitting transcripts?
completion: Please visit the Document Submission webpage for more detailed information on transcript requirements and instructions on submitting your transcripts.
